title: Pepi Super Stores: Fun & Games
description: Pepi Super Stores is an engaging casual game that invites children to be curious and explore a lively shopping mall filled with exciting shops and activities. You can step into the roles of fashion designer, stylist, or chef, crafting your own unique stories. Featuring 34 characters, diverse scenes and a multitude of items, this game fosters curiosity and creativity, making it ideal for kids and families.
